title: A couple of Johnny Evers--Hindu and T213-2 for trade
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: A couple of Johnny Evers--Hindu and T213-2 for trade
posts.post_content:
Hi, I'm looking to see if anyone is interested in trading for one or both of these
Evers cards for Evers cards I need. Let me know if you have a trade proposal.

[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Thanks
Mike
